text: ara apani yadi taderake jijnesa karena, asamanasamuha o yamina ke srsti karechena? Tara abasya'i balabe, 'allah.' Baluna, 'tomara bhebe dekhecha ki, allah amara anista karate ca'ile tomara allahara paribarte yaderake daka tara ki se anista dura karate parabe athaba tini amara prati anugraha karate ca'ile tara ki se anugrahake rodha karate parabe?' Baluna, 'amara jan'ya allaha'i yathesta.' Nirbharakarigana tamra upara'i nirbhara kare
